text:
Abhishek brrrrrrrrrroooooooo......

yaar aj bhi tumhara wo "Rajan bro!!!!" bahut hi sweet lagta hai, bas sun ke hi dil bag bag ho jata hai. Tumhara itna lamba- chaura sharir dekhke kitni bar mai dar hi jata tha. But itne sweet, simple and  jovial ho tum, ye pata nahi tha. 

Tumhari wo avinash ke sath chat pe solar pannels pe gajab ki acting dekh ke to mai dar hi gaya tha ki kya ho gaya, but kya bawal macha dete ho be tum. Tumhara wo Avinash ke hard-pitch and soft-pitch demonstrationЁЯдгЁЯдгЁЯдг. Or roz rat ko dumsy mai tumhe struggle karte hue dekhe mai ka guilty pleasure to alag hi hota tha.

You are an amazing-amazing and person stay the same. 
Hope to met up again sometime.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yoo Abhishek

Yaar pehli baar mai tumhe apne dada wale interaction mai dekha tha. Jab mai Subway surfers khel raha tha and Ramrao niche swimming kar raha tha ЁЯШЕ. Aur tum chup chap ek kone mai aram se baith kar so rahe the. Tabhi mujhe lag gaya tha ki ye ladka bahut age jayegaЁЯШВ. 
From being that shy introvert pahadi sa ladka, "3-bot рдХреА рд▓рд╛рд╢", yaar sare courses mai bas A lagte lagte reh gaya to becoming the fun-loving and vibrant person you are today.
But I would never have got to know you better, had it not been those nights when we played UNO or cards, your poker faces, and believing you in Bluff thinking "рдЖрднрд┐рд╢реЗрдХ рдХрднреА рдЭреБрда рдирд╣реА рдмреЛрд▓рддрд╛", the last night out with Shrey and you, wo LOC101 wale course ki bate, tumhare wo adventures wali doosre desh ke kisse-kahaniyaa and how can I forget tumhara wo HMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM........ЁЯШЕ
I would cherish all these moments forever. 
Thank you for being such a sweet and understanding person, for giving me such wonderful memories.
Jarur yaar touch mai rahenge aur intezaar rahega tumhari album ka.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Aur bhai Phooking Mistry...... band ho gaya tera rona dhona. kitna rota tha yaar tu, poore last ke 2 mahine tune kuch nahi kiya and last mai phod ke ghar nikal liya.
Mujhe aj bhi yaad hai first year ke orientation tujhe fever tha and maine tere documents carry kare the and tu mujhpe hi gussa karne laga tha. Us time mujhe laga itne selfish and MC kaise ho sakte hai log. But wo kehte hai na dont judge a book by and aj char sal bad mujhe lagata hi you are perhaps the most kindhearted and sweet person I've ever met. 
In my entire 4 years, I couldn't think of a single day when we weren't together ЁЯШЕ. Right from 3 bot to Athletics CPA to Group - B of 1st year. Machana to tumne ate hi start kar diya tha, 1st sem mai hi district mai gold and was offered to go to INTER IIT but bhai had other plans. 
From pulling an allnighter before the PHY 103A exam, or, keeping up with Ram Narain RIP workout ЁЯШн, or, late night campus walks, or, hearing about your plans to make money ЁЯдС, or asking you for money in library and buying stocks with it, and dhawal making a story about - "Aditya ne ek bar Rajan ko paise diye - bas yahi take this story uske bad Aditya ko kabhi wo paise wapis nahi mile"ЁЯШВ. 
But the best part was perhaps the summer camp with athletics team, waking up early in morning and cribbing about the workout, going to ganga barrage, Playing cards and hearing about the stories of seniors, Making stories about others, and going swimming,  and then the blue world trip Yaad hai jab hum hamari kitni fat rahi this uchi rides pe and jab hum us ride pai top see gir gaye the..... 
Magar fir tum bade ho gaye or humse jyada samay apne any freindsssss ke sath samay bitane lage the. Aur fir tumhari jindgi mai kusum ayi....
Hume to laga that Aditya humare liye campus aya hai but nahi..... Aditya ko to ghadi chaiye thi. 
But campus ke wo last months mai kitna maza kiya that yaar, wo photoshoot outs, wo tumhare walk pe na jane wale bahane, hall 4 and 9 ki chat pe gyan wali bate, and holi pe tumhara jalwari wala dance, long distance road running in the lockdown and, your future plans at the age of 25 ЁЯдгЁЯдгЁЯдг. 
Bahut yaad ayega yaar.  But touch mai rehna kabhi bhi man kare to call ya text kar dena.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Aur Pandey ji 
bilkul sahi kaha tha tumne agar thoda sa time aur mai tumhari wing mai rehta na jaur tum log mujhe apna bana dete. sala aisa lagta tha ki konse desh aa gaya hu, koi kahi se bhi lapakne ko a jata tha. 

But akhri semseter mai itna enjoy kara, uska sabse bada karan tumhari wing hi thi. Tumhare wo anime suggestions to mai chah ke bhi nahi bhool paunga "B****** on Titans". Or wo tum logo ke sath movie dekhne mai to alag hi maza ata tha, magar beech mai chillane pai gali bhi sabse jyada tu hi deta tha ЁЯШВ.

Ekdum desi admi lagta tha tu mujhe. Weightlifting trials mai hi mujhe lag gaya tha ki fighter spirit hai tumhari end tak push karte the apne apko. Placement mai bhi phoda tha tumne. Bas aisi hi tarakki karte rehna. 

Ummed hai ki agli bar jab milenge tab tak wo meethapan wala keeda shant ho jayegaЁЯШЕ
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yo Sachin Boiii

Yaar campus mai final goodbye bolne ka mauka bhi nahi mila. Ye memoir uski jagah to nahi le sakta par koshish hi sahi. Waise to poori athletics family hi mast thi apni, but I really loved to spend time with you, walking and discussing. Just standing by your side I felt happy. But, playing by your side was altogether a different ball game. Chahe koi bhi volleyball ka match ho, chahe samne koi bhi kyo na ho. Playing with you on the net was an experience in itself. Watching you take those smashes was an absolute delight and so was bitching the other team. 

Itni sari memories to hai hi apni summer camp ki, Blueworld ki, Ganga-barrage ki, Inter IIT ki and Udghosh ki, sportech ki, and itni dher sari treats. But I really loved the one in which you came to take me to OAT for my birthday celebration. Or us IME wale course mai A lag gaya ЁЯШВ pata nahi kaise. Or bhi na jane kitna kuch hai, par tumhe to sab pata hi hai.
  
May you do wonders and marvels in whichever field you chose to pursue. 
Would love to sit together one day and discuss all about our adventures and journey so far.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
HI Atharav, 

Yaar you are the one person I always looked up to. I always used to wonder ki koi itna perfect kaise ho sakta hai yaar. Akhir kaise koi ek person, Itna jyada soft-spoken, itna jyada friendly nature, itna selfless, itna jyada chapu kaise ho sakta hai. Yeah, it looks like a random confession ЁЯШЕbut its the truth and straight from the heart. 

I know you have worked very very hard for achieving all this and making all this happen. I wish, I could have said this to you in person, I really respect you and I am glad I got to know you. 
Waise to tum jaha bhi jayoge waha hi naye naye milestone set karoge but All the very best for the future.

let's catch up and meet sometime, preferably in a Gym and compare our gains, discuss our lives and new adventuresЁЯШГ
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Vaahhhhhhh mazza agaya tumhara vision and mission of purpose padkeЁЯШВЁЯШВ. Man karta hai ki adha property tumhare nam kar duЁЯШЕ. Thoda jyada dramatic ho gaya. 

Par yaar tu hai hi itna mast insan ki kya kare. yaar kitne sare maje kare hum loge ne ek sath and kitne sari mauj masti karayi tune. Masti se yad aya kisne rakhe tumhare itne innovative nam, snoop dog, kali masti ЁЯдгЁЯдг. 

Kitne sare card games khele yaar sath milke, and tum jo har bar maje maje mai swag ke sath jeeet jate the, mujhe explain karte karte. Dekho ab mai ye dalunga or mai aise jeet jaungaЁЯШЕ. I really looked up to playing UNO, and cards with all you guys. 

Wo roj rat ko chat pe tum logo ka mil jana. Aur koso mil dur se tumhara wing ka wo "dadhkan- dadhkan, meri dadhkannnnn". Mujhe aaj bhi yaad hai yaad hai mera wo dumsy wala task jab mujhe "Black" movie explain karni thiЁЯШЕ, and it took just an instant. 

Kitni sare maze kare hai sath mai, Movies dekhte waqt tum mere wo beech mai chillana and tum sab log mujhe marne ate the, tumhare wo kisse kahaniyaa, wo abhishek ke sath hard-pitch, soft-pitch testingЁЯдгЁЯдг, wo to mai kabhi nahi bhul sakta. Or kitne sari cheeze aise bich mai hi choot gayi, wo zohrazabeen dance ka video and last mai milna. 

But this is not the final goodbye, hope to meet again and watch a movie together someday.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yaar Dhawal kahah se shuru karu tumhare bare mai. Tumhare sath jo maze or masti kare sath kari thi wo to kabhi nahi bhul sakte. 
The first impression i had of you was of a rich spoilt pampered kid to top that with your round-faced- pahadi look. Always playing GTA-V and watching TV series. Or Randomly kabhi "OHH Godddd", "OHHH FKKKKKKK", "BC", "MC" Bhai poori wing ko pata chal jata that ki Aj Dhawal movie ya tv-series dekh raha hai. Kisko pata that ki tumhare andar ka bathroom singer itna grow kar jayega age jaake. 
Sociology mai exam se jyada to tumhari harkate dekh ke dar lagta tha, Sochta tha "kitna chill hai yaar yee"ЁЯШВ. Mai apne ap se kehta tha "ruk jao end sem ane do sari coolness nikal jayegi" ЁЯШЕ. 
Magar afsos aisa kuch nahi hua. Dhawal bhaiya to humare shuruwad se hi chapu the. Adi ye shayad tumse kabhi keh na saka ho but wo tum teeno ko(Tu,  Deepak, Shubham ) ko first year mai bahut gali deta tha. Roj rat ko mere room ke bahar ake "Mc kya randap macha rakha hai in teeno ne mere bed pe"
Aur fir summer camp maine sakshat logo ko roast karte hue dekha. Maja to bahut aya par Mujhe nahi pata tha tere ane wale sare shows mujhi par honge ЁЯШЕ. 
And then it happened, I shifted with Hemant to another wing and jo tumhari bitching start hui kya batau. Magar had to tab ho jati thi jab tum mere hi room mai ake mere hi bed pe baith ke mujh pe hi show kar rahe hote the.  Kaise hi late night campus  walks or inhi sab bachodiyo mai samay beet gaya pata hi nahi chala. 
But the last months on the campus were the best, even the quarantine with you guys was awesome. Wo late night walks on hall 4 chat, or ninja banke shubham ka room dhundnaЁЯШВ. Listening your stories about your past your school life and your struggles, "belt se bhai-sahab dwara maar", wo 11 km daily run, wo ias -ips walo ki mast life, "wo ouija board wali kahani", "wo 6 thousand se 6 crore 6 thousand wali investment scheme" ЁЯдСЁЯдСЁЯдС. Kash real life mai bhi mere pas tere jaise credit card hota ЁЯШЭ.  But the promises we made on the hall 9 stairs top still remain unfulfilled. 
Jao yaar bahar and karo ji bhar ke jitne tour karne hai, and PERSONS nikalo yaar. Bas ji le apni jindgi and live a live to its fullest.
Thanks for being such a wonderful part of my life. 

P.S. - bas bada admi banke bhul mat jana or wo 70% -30% paise batne wala kuch nahi tha bas tum hi log chadaye ja rahe the.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Arrey yaar divyanshu, ab jab mai ye memoir likh raha hu bahut bura lag raha hai ЁЯШЕ. 

Yaar kitna bhola bhala sa chehra tha tera. Shayad isi wajah se dhawal and tomanud kitni roast karte the tujhe. Magar tum bhi to kuch kam to nahi the ЁЯШВ Or us par itni pyari cringy si smile tumhari kya kehne. 

Jab pehli bar tumhe dekha tha to laga ekdam takla ho rakhe the tum and tumhare brownish se datЁЯШБ.
Mai Tamonud se PHY103 ke doubts puch raha tha, and tum room mai ate hi chillane lage  - "bahar jake karo ye sabh mai disturb ho raha hu".  Mujhe andar se hi ek awaj ayi ki bhai is bande se to door hi rehna hai, mujhe bhi gutka and nashe ki lat laga degaЁЯШЕ. 
 
But dheere dheere tumhe kareeb se janne ke bad laga ki kitne bade bhram mai tha mai. Tumhare sath wo A.K. Sharma ki class ki rangeen baate kabhi nahi bhulunga mai, tumhare Reading room mai sone par fine wali kahaniyaa,  Or wo tumhara explain karne ka tareeka about "Galaxy mai HSS prepration mai kya hota hai?", and "First day of Tamonud at dance class with senior" ЁЯдгЁЯдг. 
"Gaali se comfortable ho?"  or fir Tamonud ka expression face jo tum banate the  ЁЯе▓  ЁЯе▓ .

Yaar koi kuch bhi kahe dil ke bahut acche ho tum. And tumhari ek sabse acchi quality thi ki tum humesha lage rehte hai and your quality of never giving up was I always looked up to. Chahe wo Prof ko bar bar bol ke summer of code mai entry lena ho ya. making the entire summer of code project in one night.ЁЯШЕ just leave it up to Divyanshu. 

Tumhare sath last sem mai bahut maja aya. Tumhara wo Game of Thrones ka revision so that you can impress the interviewer with its dialougeЁЯдпЁЯдп, sahi mai kaam aya. Wo tum sabhi logo ke sath photoshoot out, long-night walks, discussion at OAT, holi celebration, and much much much much more will always be something I will always forever. Agar maine tumhare sath Cards mai bluff nahi khela hota to mai kabhi bhi COOL Divyanshu ko nahi dekh pata ЁЯШОЁЯШО. Jo bina cards dekhe hi bata deta tha ki kon bluff mar raha hai. 

All in all kitna maja kara hai sath mai hum logo ne. All the very best for your upcoming stints in life.

author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Aur Apple ke kholu

yaar, placements ke time pe ye to pata chal gaya tha ki ek banda hai Geetam Nam ka jiska APPLE mai hua hai. Mujhe humesha hi lagta raha ki hoga koi maggu sa bandaЁЯШЕ. 

Ek do bar UNO and bluff bhi khel liya tha tumhare sath last sem tab bhi nahi pata chala tha tumhare bare mai. But jab tumne aise hi tumne kuldeep ke julm ki dastaan byaan karna shuru kari. ki kaise usne ek hi training session mai tumhari kamar and anguthe ki ungli tod di. Even bat surgery tak pahuch gayi. Tab mujhe laga ki kitna kharab insan hai kuldeep ЁЯШВ Aisi thodi karta hai kisi dost ke sath.   

Dheere dhere pata chala ki kitne same pasand and napasand hai hummari, be it animes, movies, Tv- series, or life in general. I wish ki thoda aur pehle janna hota tumhe. Anyways never forget those feuds among us between the Bluff and UNO matches, and the dance like anything on the DJ night in Kuldeep's room. 
 
All the very best for the future.
Hope to meet up again sometime.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Jassi tere sath rehkar aur kuch sikha ho ya na but ye to pakka sikh hi gaye ki whenever on camera 
SAY JASSSIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII ЁЯШВЁЯШВЁЯШВЁЯШВ

Waise to mujhe bhi yaad nahi ki apni sabse pehle baat kab hui thi  ЁЯШЕ  ЁЯШЕ. but ab mujhe lagta hai tujhse aur pehle baat kyo nahi kari thi.
Yaar Maine pehle baar tere bare mai tab suna tha jab humare midsem ke results aa gaye the and mess me Dhawal wagera keh rahe the - wo dekh Jassi ne wo Jassi hai, usne MTH101 ka paper phoda hai. To chapu to apna jassi pehle se hi tha. 

2nd year ke udhgosh se leke ane wale sare tournaments mai humesha dekhta tha ye kon banda hai yaar humesha volleyball ke match me itne enthu ke sath cheering karne aajata hai.
Par tujhse achhe se bat karna to 4th sem se hi start kara tha when you became the gensec and I was the captain. Those council meetings, strategy planning, talks with the coaches, and roaming around the campus, the calculation for GC standings, made our bond of friendship much stronger.

So much so that I loved our after-practice talks in Hall - 3 Mess, with Bhaskar and Sachin and others, where you would take my extras like no care grin like ЁЯШБ.  Then Mess wale bhaiya would ask us "bhaiya bahut time ho gaya hai" and we would rush to your room to submit one or another assignment.  Waha pe bechara Vikky baith ke assignment kar raha hota thaЁЯШЕЁЯШЕ

I felt like I was your roommate for 3rd year. Your motivational seminar - "koi nahi yaar, hum karenge hum mehnat karenge aur MTH ke endsem phodengeЁЯШВЁЯШВ". I cant think of anything jiski humne tere room mai baithke stragety na banayi ho 

marks kaise lane hai?
yaar kaise niklega ye courseЁЯШе?
teams ki performance kyo nahi aa rahi hai?
Yaar body kaise banayuЁЯШЕ?
and ye wala to epic tha - Inter IIT 2019 mai roorkee mai kaha ghoomne jayegneЁЯШВЁЯШВ"?
ye sab to kuch na ho saka but kam se kam passout hone  see pehle campus aa gaye wahi bahut hai.
Wo akkri din jab jor barish ho rahi thi and sab ro rahe the ab lagta hai life ka kitna bada hissa yahi campus mai hi chod ja rahe hai.
Ek bar to placement ke time ye laga ki itne ache log bhi hote hai kya( if you know what I mean ЁЯШЕ). But sahi mai yaar bahut accha nature hai tera and kitne acche tarike se bat karta hai tu. Looks like i am writing confessionЁЯШЕ. But its true. 
Kharagpur mai jitne maje tere aur Tiwari ke sath aye the cheering mai cahe wo Lawn tennis ki ho ЁЯШЙ ya Basketball ki. Koi game nahi choda tha yaar jisme gala nahi baith gaya ho chill chilla ke. I will always cherish these memories with you and the entire contingent.
Bas yaar touch mai rehna and bada admi bankar bhul mat jaiyo.
author: Rajan  Singh

рдЬреЛ рдХреА рдПрдХ рдХрд░реНрдорда, рдЪрд╛рдкреБ рддрдерд╛ рджрд┐рд▓рджрд╛рд░ рдкреНрд░рд╡рд░реНрддрд┐ рдХрд╛ рд╡реНрдпрдХреНрддрд┐ рд╣реИред рдЬреЛ рдЕрдЧрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рджреЛрд╕реНрддреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдордЬреЗ рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рддреЛ рдЙрдирдХреА рдХрдорд░ рддрдерд╛ рд╣рдбреНрдбрд┐рдпрд╛ рднреА рддреБреЬрд╡рд╛ рджреЗрддрд╛ рд╣реИред 
рдЬреЛ рдЕрдЧрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдорд┐рддреНрд░реЛ рдХреЛ рддрд╛рд╢ рдЦреЗрд▓рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдЖрдордВрддреНрд░рд┐рдд рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рддреЛ рд╕рд╛рдЬрд┐рд╢ рд░рдЪрдХреЗ рдЙрдирдХреЛ рдлрд╕рд╡рд╛ рднреА рджреЗрддрд╛ рд╣реИ, рддрдерд╛ рдЗрд╕рдореЗрдВ рдЙрд╕реЗ рдЕрд╕реАрдо рдЖрдирдВрдж рдХреА рдкреНрд░рд╛рдкреНрддрд┐ рднреА рд╣реЛрддреА рд╣реИред рдЬреЛ LOC101 рдХреЗ рдХреЛрд░реНрд╕ рдореЗ рдкреНрд░реЛрдлреЗрд╕реНрд╕рд░ рд╣реЛрдиреЗ рдХреЗ рдХрд╛рд░рдг рд▓реЛрдЧреЛ рдХреЛ рдКрдЯ-рдкрдЯрд╛рдВрдЧ рдмрд╛рддреЗ рдмрддрд╛рддрд╛ рд╣реИред  

рд╕рджрд╛ рдРрд╕реЗ рд╣реА рд░рд╣рдирд╛ рддрдерд╛ рджреБрдЖрдУ рдореЗ рдпрд╛рдж рд░рдЦрдирд╛ред  

рдЕрдЪреНрдЫрд╛ рднрд╛рдИ рд░рд╛рдзреЗрд╜рд╜рд╜
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yaar Mathuriya, 

Tere bare mai to jitna kahu utna kam hai yaar. poore apne athletics team ki jaan hai tu. I dont know itni energy late kaha se ho? humesha high on life rehte ho ЁЯШЕЁЯШЕ. Waise to humesha hi athletics team mai har roz ek naya adventure hota tha, but apan pehalwan log to alag hi the.ЁЯШО
 
Yaar roj 4 round marne mai kitni marti thi apani, and tumhari stories and out of the blue dialogue sun ke to ekdam mazza hi aa jata tha. Wo jumpers ki btiching ЁЯШВ kuch nahi karte ye log bas mat bicha ke baith jate hai and squat to masha allaahhhhhh. 

Kuch bhi kaho apne 1st year athletics summer camp jaisa to koi time nahi tha. chahe ho Blue world wala trip ho ya ganga barrage, kabaddi ya Anjani mam ki exercises, with athletics family, I was on lookout for every session. Par shayad kismat ko kuch or hi manzoor tha, par wo sab chodo. Ek raz ki baat batau mujhe bhi tumse bahut zyada dar lagta tha discuss throw mai. Jabse tum wo blue color wali cut sleeve mai ane lage the and last mai chillate the, ring ke bahar sab ki bhi fat jati thi. Last mai kya khatarnak body bana liye the be. 

Tere bare me mai keh sakta hu ki is bande ne IITK and IIT Delhi ke poore maze liye hai ЁЯШВ. Aise hi rehna and Jab IAS ban jaye to bhul mat jana.
Hope to catch up very soon
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Mujhe dang se yaad nahi hai ki apni pehli bar bat kab hui thi. But apan dono ko 2nd year mai realise ho gaya tha ki MTH department mai ane wale 3 sal kaise hone wale hai ЁЯШЕ. Tab bhi bas class, lecture and assignments tak hi zindgi ghumti rahi. 

Par 3rd year mai Jassi ke Gensec ban jane ke bad to har roz ek naya din, ek nayi josh, or urja ke sath roj koi na koi panga le ata thaЁЯШЕ. Kabhi wo Jassi ki ladai ho gayi, kabhi udghosh a gaya, to kabhi kisi ke purane dukh-dard ubhar aye, Yes, we had it all. Jassi ka room, jisme Jassi khud kabhi nahi rehta tha, humara adda ban chuka tha. Aisi hi randomly kahi bhi ja rahe ho ya khel rahe ya kam kar rahe ho. ekdam achanak se yaad ata tha are yaarrrrr aj assingment dena hai, kal quiz hai. Room pe aye to becharaa vikky tab se laga hua hai, sara assignment kar rakha hai, sab pad dalaЁЯШВ. Fir hat-pair jodke use manate the to vikky bhi maje leta tha - "yaar tum log har bar aisa hi karte ho", "tum log bahut kahrab hoЁЯШВ". Yaar kuch bhi hota tha, koi kisi ka bhi assignment kar raha hai. Or DS ke assignment ke bad ki party in canteen was dope. Every small achievement was celebrated. 

Us time mujhe nahi pata tha ki tere andar ek or chamatkari insan hai jo age chalke tumhari puri wing ko apne jaisa kar dega.  Dheere dheere tumhare andar ka wo insan bahar ane laga and puri wing ko рдореАрдард╛рдкрди рд╕реЗ рдЧреНрд░рд╕рд┐рдд рдХрд░ рджрд┐рдпрд╛ред  Tum or tumhare lover ke kisse famous hone lage. 

Par kuch bhi kaho akhri ke jitne bhi the din the college ke bahut maza aya tumhari poori wing ke sath. Par jitna maza aya utna dar bhi lagta tha, pata nahi kon kaha se aa jaye. Chahe wo sabhi ke sath movie dekhna ho, ya cards kehlna , ya dumsy, (thoda suffer bhi karna pada par ЁЯШЕ) every moment was wonderful. 

Thanks for being such a wonderful friend. 
Let's catch up someday.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Remember the first day of all three of us met for the first time in room 131, 3-Bot. Yaar kitne kush, proud the hum log, after coming to IITK. Reithick ka to pata nahi but apan dono ka to ye tha ki pura muaj masti karni hai. Jitni JEE ke liye mehnat kari hai uska pura badla nikalna hai. Aur tum lag gaye full flow mai, first week mai GOT khatamЁЯШВ, and then there was no turning back. 

Yaar kisko pata tha ki, hum teeno bhai, Chuss╬▓, King Joffery, Mr R..... , Shubham, Ravi Family ban jayenge. Tumhare sath wo Mili-milaita ke matches (fir usme ladai ЁЯШВ), fir PUBG ke matches ( jo jyada nahi chala fir Mili - Milaita pe aa gaye, Fir se ladai ЁЯШВ), fir Cards ( usme bhi ladai ЁЯШВ) , and then came the monopoly  and uski deals.ЁЯШВЁЯШВЁЯШВ. 

Bhai aise hi bita hai pura bachpan. Aisa kehna ki Bahut maza kara bahut jyada nainsafi hogi. Now that I look back I feel that I shouldn't have missed those parties with all you guys instead of weightlifting practice. We should have played more and more Mili - milaita or Monopoly, or anything with you guys. As everything with you all was superfun. 

I really liked your child-like nature of inquisitiveness and curiosity perhaps that is why you were able to get so good marks even after one night of studyЁЯШВ. With all you guys, you, in particular, I have had some of the best of talks and discussions, which really shaped me as a person. 

Ab mai tere se bat karta hu to lagta hai kitna bada admi ban gaya hai prajwalЁЯШВЁЯШВ, Yaar international level competition jeet rahe ho, aur ram jane coding mai kya kya karte rehte ho. But jokes apart am really proud of you, and grateful that I got to spend such a wonderful time of my life with all of you guys.

Lets meet together once again in then you can perhaps give me all the pending parties ЁЯШЬ
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yaar pata nahi tha ki first year ka wo bhola bhala masum sa bachha akhir mai chalke itna machayega. First year mai laga nahi tha itne maje karenge sath mai. Aur tumhare upar jo kahaniya sunathe the dusre log, khaskar divyanshu wo to dope thiЁЯШВ. Aur, monopoly mai tum itni gandi gandi deals dete the uspe to kya hi kaha jaye. But all in all, I am glad we met and became such good friends.
Ab itna bada admi bad gaya hai to bhul to jayoge hi, ЁЯШЕ but fir bhi keep in touch.
Aur last mai jo tum shrink ho gaye the uska bhi secret batana.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yaar tumhare bare mai to koi acchi baat yaad hi nahi aa rahi hai ( not my fault). let me see where do we start, Chapu, superb player, Ladykiller, apna Ritik Roshan, WORST ROOMMATE ЁЯШЭ, Wo tumhare sath late night campus walks, out of blue philosophical talks, and playing cards and monopoly and what not. And your constant cribbing about how "app will not allow it".
But you were the one person whom I could reach any time and discuss anything. I will cherish each and every moment shared with you forever. 
stay like that and keep in touch.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Or Gujju bhai, kaise ho!

Yaar mai kabhi tumse ye samne keh nahi paya but tum mujhe ekdam cool due, chill bro lagte ho ЁЯШО. 
Waise to most of the interaction humara notes, classes and assignment ke related hi hua. But tumhara nature and friendly nature kafi accha lagta hai mujhe. Shayad tumhe pata ho ya na pata ho, but tumhare ipad wale notes pe kitne sare logo ka bhala hua haiЁЯШЕ. Usse dekh ke hi padne ka man karne lagta tha and unse read karne mai kabhi akho par jor nahi padta tha. Yeah feels like you've paid me but its trueЁЯШВ.  

Thanks for being such an amazing and wonderful person that you are.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:

рдЙрд╕рдХреЗ рдКрдкрд░ рд╕реЗ рддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд░реЗ рдХрдкрдбреЗ рдкрд╣рдирдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рддрд░реАрдХрд╛, рд╣рдореЗрд╢рд╛ рдкреИрдВрдЯ, рдФрд░ рдмрдиреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдмрд╛рд▓ред  рдРрд╕рд╛ рд▓рдЧрддрд╛ рдерд╛ рдордиреЛ рдХрд┐рд╕реА рдиреЗрддрд╛ рд╡рдЧреЗрд░рд╛ рдХреА рд╕рд╛рде рдорд┐рд▓ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реВрдБред рдордЧрд░ рдЕрдм рд▓рдЧрддрд╛ рд╣реИ рдХреА рдЗрддрдирд╛ рдЧрд▓рдд рдХреИрд╕реЗ рд╣реЛ рд╕рдХрддрд╛ рдерд╛ рдореИрдВред 
рддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд░рд╛ рд╡реЛ рд░реЛреЫ рд░рд╛рдд рдХреЛ 9 : 30  рдкреЗ mess  рдХреА рдФрд░ рд░рд╡рд╛рдирд╛ рд╣реЛрдирд╛, рдФрд░ рдореЗрд░реА рдерд╛рд▓реА рджреЗрдЦрдХреЗ рдЕрдЪрдВрднрд┐рдд рд╣реЛ рдЬрд╛рдирд╛ рдореИрдВ рдХрднреА рдирд╣реАрдВ рднреВрд▓реВрдВрдЧрд╛ ред рд╡реЛ рдбрд┐рдирд░ реШреЗ рд╕рдордп рдХреА рдмрд╛рддреЗ рдФрд░ рддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд░реА рдорд╛рдирдиреАрдп рдореЛрджреА рдЬреА реШреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдкреНрд░рд╢рдВрд╕рд╛ реШреЗ рдкреБрд▓, рдФрд░ рд╡реЛ "рдХреНрдпрд╛ рд▓рдп рдореИрдВ рдЧрд╛рд▓реА рджреА рд╣реИ ", "рдЧрд▓реА рдХрд╣реЗ рджреЗ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реИ ", рддреЛ рд╢рд╛рдпрдж рд╣рдореЗрд╢рд╛ рдпрд╛рдж рд░рд╣реЗрдВрдЧреЗред

text:
Arrey arey ye kya likha hai - gamer boy? What about Mai bhagna chahta hu, udna cahta hu, girna cahta hu, but rukna nahi cahta hu ЁЯШВ ЁЯШВ
Yaar life se mujhe bas yahi shikayat hai ki tumse pehle kabhi baat kyo nahi ki?
First-year mai jab tum adi ke room pe randaap macha ke use bahar kar dete the, tab wo mujhe batata tha ki kaise roommates hai uskeЁЯШЖ. Aur mujhe lagta tha ki tum bas 24x7 bas gaming karte ho nothing else. But ab mujhe lagta hai ki kitna galat tha mai. I never thought ki hummari likes, dislikes, sab itne acche se match karte hai. 
Chahe late night campus walk ho ya after lunch stairs pe discussion ya fir hall 9 chat par gyan wali bate it was always a delight interacting with you. Tumhare, Dhawal aur Aditya ke wo height hight wale jokesЁЯШб. Ya basketball ground mai tum logo ke school ki dukh bhari dastaan, ЁЯШЕ. Bahut yaad ayengi.
But kuch bhi kaho sabse jyada maja to tumhare room mai sabke sath tumhare bad pe baithke or tumhare laptop pe gane sunke discussion karne mai ata tha. The holi party was Dope!!! and tumhara jalparaЁЯднЁЯдн.
Tumhara wo mujhe skating sikhane ka tarika jisme mai gir raha hota tha and tum mast se Dhawal se bat kar rahe hote the. and out of the blue anime discussion at litrellly at any time of night. Wo photoshoot ke time ke cheap thrills and your piro wale photoshop skills bahut yaad ayega. 
Thanks for being such a wonderful person that you are.
Bas touch mai rehna bhai.
author: Rajan  Singh

text: I don't recall even a single time you called me by my real name ЁЯШВЁЯШВЁЯШВ in the span of the entire 4 years.
author: Rajan  Singh

text:
Yooo Thanya, 
Yaar you are one of the most fun-loving and chill person and an amazing sportsperson, I have ever met in entire life. Tera wo carefree attitude, and kuch nahi pada bol bolke, ЁЯШЕ exam chap dene wala style do kamal hi tha. And tera wo hindi plus english mai gali dene ka tareka bhi kaafi ajeeb aur mast tha. 
tujhse kabhi in person kehne ka mauka nahi mila, but lage hato aj hi keh deta hu. You are the most sincere and hardworking sportsperson of our entire campus. Your love and passion for the game was just unparalleled. Chahe court pe koi aye ya na aye team sports ke liye bhi roj pahuch jati thi tu practice pe ЁЯШЕ.  You have motivated so many people, including me, to come to practice daily. I really liked your ability to live in the moment and and give your best in everything. I can't think of any sports in which you were not good at, and there wasn't any game you didn't enjoyed playing. Really enjoyed cheering for you and anti-cheering for other teamsЁЯШЬ at Inter IIT and IIT Delhi. 

Aise hi jindgi mai age chapte rehna, logo ko motivate karte rehna and maze karte rehna.
author: Rajan  Singh
